info.name: Add to bookmarks Plus
info.description:
This userstyle make visible more items in the "Add to bookmark" dialog window (it appear clicking on the star in Firefox 3 location bar or pressing CTRL-D). 

NOTE: this style is for Firefox 3. It doesn't work with previous version of Firefox.
